definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: bu4 que4 ding4 xing4 yuan2 li3

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，风水还与占数学的原理结合起来使用。

sentences.english: The Rapid Displacement Heating (RDH) cooking process has been developed by Beloit Corporation as an energy efficient pulping system.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了快速置换加热间歇蒸煮化学和技术的原理。

sentences.english: The equipartition law of energy is also briefly demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 同时，对能均分原理也作了简洁的论证。

sentences.english: As to whether this accords with legal principle, it is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 但是否符合法律原理，却值得商榷。

sentences.english: The types and homogenizing principles of blending silos were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了粉体混料仓的型式及掺混原理。

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理与家用的空气净化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: The application principles and methods are demonstrated of nuclear radiation technique in gemmology.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了核辐照技术在宝石学中的应用原理和方法。

sentences.english: Describes the constitution, principle and the latest of Homodialysis Machine.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了血液透析机的组成原理及最新进展。

sentences.english: This paper describes the basic principles of the image digitizer and its development course.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了图像数字化器的基本原理及其发展过程。

sentences.english: The illumination energy saving on Dayaowan container stack yard is dismissed based on the illumination theory.
sentences.chinese: 从照明原理阐述大窑湾集装箱堆场高杆灯照明节能。

sentences.english: The working principle of vertical slicer with pusher was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了推板式垂直分切机的工作原理。

sentences.english: The survey principle of a magneto ignition system ignition advance angle was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了磁电机点火系统的点火提前角测量原理。

sentences.english: In this paper the principles, Structure and processing methods of quartz capsule are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了石英膜盒的工作原理，结构和制造工艺。

sentences.english: The basic principle of a detached type erasible and rewritable reinforced optic head is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了加固型可摄重写分离式光学头的基本工作原理。

sentences.english: The methods for measuring the geometry dimension of graphite electrode tapered nipples as well as the measurement mechanism adopted are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了测量石墨电极接头的各种方法及测量原理。

sentences.english: The importance of Pauli principle manifests itself clearly.
sentences.chinese: 泡利原理的重要性清楚地表现了出来。
